name: Bonpara, Inc
description: Developer of a digital platform designed to launch online stores. The company's platform offers a variety of tools and integrations, such as payment gateways, shipping carriers, and marketing and analytics tools, enabling businesses to get a convenient and cost-effective way to set up and manage their online stores and increase their sales.
one_liner: Developer of a digital platform designed to launch online stores. The company's platform offers a variety of tools and integrations, such as payment gateways, shipping carriers, and marketing and analytics tools, enabling businesses to get a convenient and cost-effective way to set up and manage their online stores and increase their sales.
